message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is worth more than $10000 to me due to its unique features and the time invested in its development. I am offering it to you for $15000. I believe this price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. Let's discuss how we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Considering my budget and the value I place on this product, I'm willing to offer $10000. Let's see if we can find common ground there.
